data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 81,500 people living in Daxing‘anling, Heilongjiang, China. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Daxing‘anling, Heilongjiang, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 6,183 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Daxing'anling.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Daxing‘anling, Heilongjiang, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Daxing‘anling, Heilongjiang, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Oroqen people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Daxing‘anling, Heilongjiang, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Daxing'anling, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 81,500 people living in Daxing'anling.

location.name: Daxing'anling
